title: My Friends list Icon appears on the My Profile screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Profile Tab
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the top right corner of the Profile tab
custom_expected: THEN My Friends list icon will be present

title: Tapping on My Friends
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Profile Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the top right corner of the Profile tab
AND tap on the My Friends icon
custom_expected: THEN the My Friends screen will successfully open

title: Pressing Back button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have accessed the My Friends screen via the My Profile screen
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the back arrow in the top left corner
custom_expected: THEN we'll be returned to the My Profile screen

title: My Friends import options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have accessed the My Friends screen via the My Profile screen
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Facebook and Contacts section at the top
custom_expected:
THEN we will see an option for Facebook
AND next to Facebook will be a button to Connect
AND we will see an option for Contacts under Facebook
AND next to Contacts will be a button to Sync

title: User receives authorization prompt when attempting to Sync Contact List first time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head installed
AND they have navigated to the My Friends screen
AND they have never Synchronized their Contact List
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Sync button next to Contacts
custom_expected:
THEN the following authorization prompt will appear:
> Access Contacts
> To find friends, we'll need to upload your contacts.  Don't worry, your contacts won't be stored.
> Cancel | OK

title: User presses Cancel to the Contact Sync Authorization Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head installed
AND they have navigated to the My Friends screen
AND they have never Synchronized their Contact List
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the Sync button next to Contacts
AND receives the Authorization Prompt
AND presses Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN the Authorization Dialog will dismiss
AND the user's Contact's will not be synchronized

title: User presses OK to the Contact Sync Authorization Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Head to Head installed
AND they have navigated to the My Friends screen
AND they have never Synchronized their Contact List
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the Sync button next to Contacts
AND receives the Authorization Prompt
AND presses OK
custom_expected:
THEN the user's contact list will be scanned
AND Contacts who's e-mail is registered with Head to Head will appear in the Friends and Contacts List

title: User receives authorization prompt when choosing Connect option
User is able to see new Facebook friends after choosing 'Connect'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has previously connected Facebook within the Head to Head app
AND then the user is disconnected
AND the user adds new friends to Facebook
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'connect' to reconnect to Facebook
custom_expected: THEN user will see all newly added friends on the Facebook contact list

title: User is able to see new Facebook friends through auto-refresh while being connected
custom_preconds:
Given the user has loaded Head to Head Challenge
And the user has connected to Facebook
And the user remains connected to Facebook
custom_steps: When the user adds new friends to Facebook
custom_expected: Then the user will see these friends added to Facebook contact list
